item.title: Tinkering with a Microsoft MXChip IoT DevKit
item.description: The MXChip IoT Devkit byt Microsoft is a very interesting device, loaded with sensors and promises easy setup. I followed the Microsoft tutorial to have a first look at the device, and indeed it was extremely straightforward process. I am writing this as I am approaching the end of the tutorial so not to forget any points: Install Arduino studio 1.8.8. When I tried the 1.8.11 I was getting a Could not initialize class com.
